Posts.Content: simmy52003 wrote: After 2 lumpectomies and radiation, I opted for no-hormonal therapy. A year passed by with the latest mammography done in May, thank God, cleared of any abnormalities.... though 2 days ago, I developed redness on the 'operated' breast and a visit to the Dr's was in order. Inconclusive results but was perscribed with antibiotics and anti-inflammatory meds. I'm having a funny feeling in the stomach that it may not be a simple infection... or am I being paranoid? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: A year after surgery... simmy52003 Maureen1
